description: Create a Human-in-the-Loop Modes area that explains how people accomplish goals with Planner, Builder, and Toolkit through practical collaboration loops.

userStories.title: Add Human-in-the-Loop Modes concept entry point
userStories.description: As a visitor, I want a clear entry point for Human-in-the-Loop Modes so I can discover the workflow guidance from the Concepts section.
acceptanceCriteria: Concepts area includes a Human-in-the-Loop Modes entry point
Entry has clear title and short explanation of what the area covers
Navigation path to the new area is obvious on desktop and mobile
Typecheck passes
Lint passes
Verify in browser
Works in both light and dark mode
userStories.e2eScope: Concepts navigation exposes and links to Human Work Modes entry
